item.title: Niko and the Sword of Light

Niko and the Sword of Light

A plague of shadows has swept across the land, turning innocent creatures into terrible monsters. One champion remains to battle the darkness and return the world to the light: Niko. Armed with his magic sword of light, guided by the determined Princess Lyra, and aided by his resourceful friend Mandok, young Niko journeys to the Curse-ed Volcano to face the evil sorcerer Nar Est and free his people from their magic prison, helping those in need along the way.

item.title: Niko and the Sword of Light (2017) (digital-Empire).cbr
